## Tuning Parameters

This engine has no tuning parameters but you can set the `family` and/or `link` parameters as engine arguments. 

## Translation from parsnip to the original package

```{r glm-reg}
linear_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("glm") %>% 
  translate()
```
